transcript.text: Squeezie: There's some days when you don't want to play alone...in front of your computer.
*laughs*
Micka: I believed that it was Yannou- who was speking. Wait I heard of me in the headphone

Squeezie: Wait wait... I think-
Yann: FUCK YOU!!
Squeezie: ...with my headphones. What's happening right now?
Squeezie: Why are you making fun of me?
Yann: In front of my micro-computer!
*Dat Squeezie laugh*
Squeezie: They messed it up! I was going to do a cool intro but they fucked it up!
Squeezie: Today we're with Cyril, Yann and Micka.

Yann, Micka and Cyril: Hello!
(I dunno who said "yeah"...Maybe Cyril?)
Squeezie: And we're going to play...UNO!!
Squeezie: That game you played during vacation when you were such a virgin up to the blood!
Squeezie: Well we're going back into it! And it's my favorite board game. I dunno if you've noticed but this game is awseome.
Yann: Uh...Yeah.

Squeezie: My friends, prepare yourself for some exceptions. I saw that option called "Accumulation" because I find it funny. If someone uses a +2 card on you but you have one, it's +4 for the next player.
Squeezie: That's the "extremely funny" option you agree?
Yann: *sarcastic* Well yeah I'm LOL (laughing out loud) right now.
Squeezie: Well there.
Squeezie: Truth to be told, we just got out of a game that lasted 20 minutes...
*laughs*
Squeezie: It never ended because we activated the option where you need to draw cards until you've had the right one.
Squeezie: There. And if my audience doesn't know UNO...Well...I'm dead.
Yann: Annnnnd they go fuck themselves!
Squeezie: Come on! Let the game begin. May the best one wins!
Squeezie: Um...You can vote in the comments so that it can get a good SEO (Thanks Google...) for my video, let's go.
Squeezie: Ok guys. Let's go!

Cyril: Can we intercept?
Squeezie: Yes we can intercept.

Yann: If you have the exact same card, you can put it even if it's not your turn.
Cyril: Ok.
Squeezie: Oh come on...I have such a shitty deck...Well Yann you get out. Yann you get out.
Yann: OH NO!!!

Cyril: Excellent!
Yann: Ohhh...
Cyril: Uh...Do you like cards Micka?
Micka: Yep.
Cyril: Lucky you!
*laughs*
Squeezie: get comfortable Micka
Squeezie: Hop! Hey- Hey...I'm almost to the victory...
Squeezie: Your turn Micka.

Micka: I'm going to start stealing a bit so...
Squeezie: OHHH!!!
Squeezie: Shit...That bastard.
Squeezie: I was believing.

Yann: Hop!
Cyril: Well stop already!
Squeezie: That's good right there.
Squeezie: I wish this game will be better than the first !
Squeezie: Oh fuck! Stop it!

Cyril: Here you go Yann.
Micka: NO!
Squeezie: Fuuuuuuck...
Micka: HOP!
Squeezie: OHHHHHHHH!!!!
Squeezie: It's incredible what's happening.
Squeezie: That's exceptional!
Micka: It's not crazy so maybe I'll give them to Lucas.
Squeezie: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Squeezie: Counter against Yann! Click click click! I dunno where to click...Just click...
*XD*
Squeezie: Here. A little bit of blue...
Squeezie: Thank you Yann...That's really...nice. Here Micka, I would like you to draw please.
Yann: He's bluffing! HE'S BLUFFING!
Squeezie: Bluffing or not?

Yann: He's bluffing!
Micka: Well you're bluffing...
Squeezie: WELL NOT! HERE! 6 CARDS IN YOUR FACE!
*laughs*
Squeezie: It's trying hard! There's no friendship anymore! It's over!
Micka: Yannou, I'm giving back-
Squeezie: Oh fuck...But it's okay because I counter it!!

*laughs*
Cyril: Oh excellent!

*laughs continues*
Micka: He's got all of the cards that bastard!
Cyril: Thank you Lucas, I appreciate it.
Squeezie: Your welcome Cyril!

Micka: There's some nazi alliances in this game...
Squeezie: *whisper* We're good Cyril...
Squeezie: It's really intense! It's really intense! Except for Micka, who's going to make Cyril draw.

Squeezie: Counter against Yann, counter against Yann!
Cyril: Noooo~
Cyril: COUNTER!!!
Squeezie: Wait for him to play!
Yann: Fuuuuuuuck....
Squeezie: Oh! He doesn't have green that jerk!
*laughs*
Squeezie: Counter against...Cyril. When someone doesn't yell UNO, you need to click to counter.
Squeezie: Be prepared guys, I dunno where to click but we'll click.
Micka: YAH!
Squeezie: Oh yes.

Micka: Oh noooo...
Squeezie: Oh yes.

Squeezie: Cyril, I love you. Here. Do your UNO, do your UNO.
Yann: *in the background* NOOOOOOO!
Cyril: Well not actually...

*laughs*
Squeezie: Oh no!
Cyril: Wait wait wait it's not over!
Micka: So what can we put...?

Micka: What do you have Mister Hauchard...?
Cyril: Green green green green green green green.
Cyril: Aw...

Squeezie: AND BOOM! AND BOOM!
Cyril: Oh no!
Micka: Oh no!

Micka: I have so many cards-
Cyril: Watch out! That's gonna hurt!
Squeezie: NO! NO! He draw a yellow +2 card that bastard!
Squeezie: COUNTER! COUNTER!

Squeezie : OHOHOOOOOOH AHAHAHAH
Yann : NO !
Cyril : Oooooooh oh lala
Squeezie : YEESSS
Squeezie : YEESSS
Yann : Oh, but I have pressed the button-
Squeezie : You have the rights to be bad, there's not- there's no shame

Squeezie : Don't be disgusted
Cyril : But, noo !
Micka : Shut upp
Squeezie : Don't be disguuuuusted
Cyril : Micka, do you have a +2
Micka : No, I don't
Squeezie : Don't be- Liar, it's his "lying voice" fuck, I'll take a-
Cyril : No but, really, if you have it you can-, BAM
Micka : But no, I don't have one
*Laughs*
Cyril : Well, so we lost

Squeezie : OOOOOOOOOH YESSS !!
Cyril : We lost
Yann : Yeah, fuck

Cyril : NOOO
Squeezie : YESS
Squeezie : The biggest UNO player of France won !! WOOOOW !!
Cyril : It's your video, I let you won, I mean, it's normal..
Squeezie : You know what, we'll do the revenge on your chanel (super konar), we'll see if you win
Micka : The guys are doing 1vs1 on UNO
*Laughs*
Squeezie : We will settle it on UNO !
Squeezie : Okay, let's go
Squeezie : Okay, a green 4
Squeezie : Your turn Micka
